comment: Directory where the listed .json input files are located
Base GNDStk directory into which the autogenerator tool
TO AUTOGENERATE THE PROTOTYPE IN THE REAL GNDStk HIERARCHY
Set GNDSDir to .. if you run json2class.exe from within
GNDStk/autogen/, where GNDStk/ is the cloned repository
Do NOT end the directories (JSONDir and GNDSDir) with a /
